alert.note: Alert for Butte; Lawrence (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 4:26PM MDT until May 27 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BUTTE AND NORTHERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 425 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northeast of Spearfish, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Spearfish, Belle Fourche, Whitewood, Saint Onge, Fruitdale, Crow Peak, southeastern Belle Fourche Reservoir and northern Spearfish Canyon. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 5 and 27. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
